name: Five in a row
description:
Gobang is an intelligence game that uses a checkerboard and black and white pieces to play.

Players can start a thrilling Five in a row game anytime and anywhere.

Starting from scratch, players can learn chess skills and engage in battles with AI to achieve the goal of gradually learning.

Game highlights

1. Pair Five in a row game, with mobile phone as chessboard, immerse yourself in military chess battles, and have a real fighting experience

2. Square inch fingertips, whirlwind chess, always enjoy playing

3. Gobang Battle, no age limit, suitable for all ages, full of fun

4. An antique chessboard with charming Chinese style features, classics that cannot be missed

5. Simple Warring States chessboard design with distinct black and white chess pieces for endless gameplay
